11 namespace raylib {
15 class Model : public ::Model {
16  public:
17  Model() {
18  // Nothing.
19  }
20 
21  /*
22  * Copy a model from another model.
23  */
24  Model(const ::Model& model) {
25  set(model);
26  }
27 
28  /*
29  * Load a model from a file.
30  *
31  * @throws raylib::RaylibException Throws if failed to load the Modal.
32  */
33  Model(const std::string& fileName) {
34  Load(fileName);
35  }
36 
37  /*
38  * Load a model from a mesh.
39  *
40  * @throws raylib::RaylibException Throws if failed to load the Modal.
41  */
42  Model(const ::Mesh& mesh) {
43  Load(mesh);
44  }
45 
46  ~Model() {
47  Unload();
48  }
49 
50  Model(const Model&) = delete;
51 
52  Model(Model&& other) {
53  set(other);
54 
55  other.meshCount = 0;
56  other.materialCount = 0;
57  other.meshes = nullptr;
58  other.materials = nullptr;
59  other.meshMaterial = nullptr;
60  other.boneCount = 0;
61  other.bones = nullptr;
62  other.bindPose = nullptr;
63  }

76  set(model);
77  return *this;
78  }

82  Model& operator=(Model&& other) noexcept {
83  if (this == &other) {
84  return *this;
85  }
86 
87  Unload();
88  set(other);
89 
90  other.meshCount = 0;
91  other.materialCount = 0;
92  other.meshes = nullptr;
93  other.materials = nullptr;
94  other.meshMaterial = nullptr;
95  other.boneCount = 0;
96  other.bones = nullptr;
97  other.bindPose = nullptr;
98 
99  return *this;
100  }
101 
105  inline void Unload() {
106  if (meshes != nullptr || materials != nullptr) {
107  ::UnloadModel(*this);
108  meshes = nullptr;
109  materials = nullptr;
110  }
111  }
112 
116  inline Model& UnloadKeepMeshes() {
117  ::UnloadModelKeepMeshes(*this);
118  return *this;
119  }
120 
124  inline Model& SetMeshMaterial(int meshId, int materialId) {
125  ::SetModelMeshMaterial(this, meshId, materialId);
126  return *this;
127  }
128 
132  inline Model& UpdateAnimation(const ::ModelAnimation& anim, int frame) {
133  ::UpdateModelAnimation(*this, anim, frame);
134  return *this;
135  }
136 
140  inline bool IsModelAnimationValid(const ::ModelAnimation& anim) const {
141  return ::IsModelAnimationValid(*this, anim);
142  }

147  inline Model& Draw(::Vector3 position,
148  float scale = 1.0f,
149  ::Color tint = {255, 255, 255, 255}) {
150  ::DrawModel(*this, position, scale, tint);
151  return *this;
152  }

158  ::Vector3 position,
159  ::Vector3 rotationAxis,
160  float rotationAngle = 0.0f,

162  ::Color tint = {255, 255, 255, 255}) {
163  ::DrawModelEx(*this, position, rotationAxis, rotationAngle, scale, tint);
164  return *this;

181  ::Vector3 position,

193  inline BoundingBox GetBoundingBox() const {
194  return ::GetModelBoundingBox(*this);
195  }
196 
200  operator BoundingBox() const {
201  return ::GetModelBoundingBox(*this);
202  }
203 
207  bool IsReady() const {
208  return meshCount > 0 || materialCount > 0 || boneCount > 0;
209  }
210 
216  void Load(const std::string& fileName) {
217  set(::LoadModel(fileName.c_str()));
218  if (!IsReady()) {
219  throw RaylibException("Failed to load Model from " + fileName);
220  }
221  }
222 
228  void Load(const ::Mesh& mesh) {
229  set(::LoadModelFromMesh(mesh));
230  if (!IsReady()) {
231  throw RaylibException("Failed to load Model from Mesh");
232  }
233  }
234 
235  private:
236  void set(const ::Model& model) {
237  transform = model.transform;
238 
239  meshCount = model.meshCount;
240  materialCount = model.materialCount;
241  meshes = model.meshes;
242  materials = model.materials;
243  meshMaterial = model.meshMaterial;
244 
245  boneCount = model.boneCount;
246  bones = model.bones;
247  bindPose = model.bindPose;
248  }
249 };
250 
251 } // namespace raylib
